plot: Melinda goes on an eventful road trip with Sam as he tries to reconnect with his old girlfriend, Delia and Ned clash over what she believes is his risky behavior, and a ghost from high school takes up residence at Delia's.

Jim 'Sam' feels increasingly uneasy about his engagement to Nicole and decides to visit her in Raleigh, but also asks Melinda along, feeling most comfortable with her, while more of his memory returns. Ned volunteers as house-sitter. Overprotective Delia, who receives high-school friends, rages at Ned for getting mixed up in parties due to schoolmates and the local ghost Angie, a teenage friend of Delia, who died after visiting a party forbidden by her parents, but the tables are turned on Delia.—KGF Vissers
